level.heading: Failure to file bond.
level.text: * ยง 11-4011 Failure to file bond. Any person willfully failing to file a bond where such filing is required pursuant to section 11-1203, 11-1304 or 11-2505 of this title shall be guilty of a misdemeanor. * NB Added Ch. 765/85 ยง 82, language juxtaposed per Ch. 907/85 ยง 14 * NB Number supplied by the Legislative Bill Drafting Commission
